title: dAkSAyaNi abhayAmbikE
sahitya:
anupallavi

A:  dIkSA santuSTa mAnasE dINAvana hasta sArasE kAnkSitArtha pradAyini 


kAma tantra vidhAyini sAkSi rUpa prakAshini samasta jagad-vilAsini caraNam    sakala niSkaLa svarUpa tEjasE sakala lOka srSTi karaNa bhrAjasE
sakala bhakta samrakSaNa yashasE sakala yOgi manOrUpa tatva tapasE prabala guruguhOdayE pancAnana hrdAlayE bharata mataNgAdinutE bhAratIsha pUjitE
